channel.title: 2 problems
channel.description:
how can i make the barrows armor have the random gfx and effect like the guthans take hp and raise yours
and how can i make it so affter an npc dies u get xp in a skill

item.description:

i dont believe u need hitDiff surrounded by these: “()”

item.title: 2 problems
item.dc:creator: @akanaz akanaz
item.description:
@akanaz wrote:

Hey Im Using Devolution 7.0 And I Get The Following Errors Just For Veracs And Dharok.

    if((IsAttackingNPC || IsAttacking) && FullDharokEquipped()) {
        int chance = 0;
        chance = misc.random(10);

           if(chance == 3) {
            playerLevel[2] += (hitDiff);
            playerLevel[1] += (hitDiff);
            sendMessage("You drain the enemies Str And Def");
            stillgfx(398, absY, absX);
        }
    }
    if((IsAttackingNPC || IsAttacking) && FullVeracsEquipped()) {
        int chance = 0;
        chance = misc.random(10);

           if(chance == 3) {
            playerLevel[16] += (hitDiff);
            playerLevel[13] += (hitDiff);
            playerLevel[0] += (hitDiff);
            sendMessage("You drain the enemies smith,att and agility!");
        }
    }

Read full topic

You don’t have to add it in the process, you can just add it in the AttackMethod and AttackNPC method, and that’s all.

item.title: 2 problems
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Open Up Client.java

Find

public boolean process()

And Add Under it:

[code] if((IsAttackingNPC || IsAttacking) && FullDharokEquipped()) {
int chance = 0;
chance = misc.random(10);

           if(chance == 3) {
            playerLevel[2] += (hitDiff);
            playerLevel[1] += (hitDiff);
            sendMessage("You drain the enemies Str And Def");
            stillgfx(398, absY, absX);
        }
    }
    if((IsAttackingNPC || IsAttacking) && FullVeracsEquipped()) {
        int chance = 0;
        chance = misc.random(10);

           if(chance == 3) {
            playerLevel[16] += (hitDiff);
            playerLevel[13] += (hitDiff);
            playerLevel[0] += (hitDiff);
            sendMessage("You drain the enemies smith,att and agility!");
        }
    }[/code]

Find:FullGuthanEquip And After The Last } Add:

[code]public boolean FullDharokEquipped() {
if(playerEquipment[playerHat] == 4716 &&playerEquipment[playerChest] == 4720 && playerEquipment[playerLegs] == 4722 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4718)
{
return true;
}
return false;

}
public boolean FullVeracsEquipped() {
    if(playerEquipment[playerHat] == 4753 && playerEquipment[playerChest] == 4757 && playerEquipment[playerLegs] == 4759 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4755)
      {
       return true;
      }
    return false;            
}[/code]

Should work.

It’s only the Verac, and Dharok effects though, i’ll see if I can find the guthan one.

Read full topic
